articles.title: Yiwen Wu
articles.description: Welcome to Yiwen's personal website, I post life, thougths, and academics.
articles.contents:
About me:
My name is Yiwen Wu, a doctoral student at the School of Public
Affairs and Administration, University of Kansas. My very shallow
knowledge in climate change science makes wonder what human beings can
do to alleviate the suffering even with irreversible climate change
effects. Combining my previous trained experience in math and urban
planning, I build models to analyze the effectiveness of local planning
policy in mitigating and adapting climate change.
Education:
B.S. in Mathematics
M.U.P. in Urban Planning
Language
Chinese and English
